segment.target: Security technologies (Windows 10)

segment.source: Learn more about the different security technologies that are available in Windows 10 and Windows 10 Mobile.
segment.target: Learn more about the different security technologies that are available in Windows 10 and Windows 10 Mobile.

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Access control
segment.target: Access control

segment.source: Describes access control in Windows, which is the process of authorizing users, groups, and computers to access objects on the network or computer.
segment.target: Describes access control in Windows, which is the process of authorizing users, groups, and computers to access objects on the network or computer.

segment.source: Key concepts that make up access control are permissions, ownership of objects, inheritance of permissions, user rights, and object auditing.
segment.target: Key concepts that make up access control are permissions, ownership of objects, inheritance of permissions, user rights, and object auditing.

segment.source: AppLocker
segment.target: AppLocker

segment.source: This topic provides a description of AppLocker and can help you decide if your organization can benefit from deploying AppLocker application control policies.
segment.target: This topic provides a description of AppLocker and can help you decide if your organization can benefit from deploying AppLocker application control policies.

segment.source: AppLocker helps you control which apps and files users can run.
segment.target: AppLocker helps you control which apps and files users can run.

segment.source: These include executable files, scripts, Windows Installer files, dynamic-link libraries (DLLs), packaged apps, and packaged app installers.
segment.target: These include executable files, scripts, Windows Installer files, dynamic-link libraries (DLLs), packaged apps, and packaged app installers.

segment.source: BitLocker
segment.target: BitLocker

segment.source: This topic provides a high-level overview of BitLocker, including a list of system requirements, practical applications, and deprecated features.
segment.target: This topic provides a high-level overview of BitLocker, including a list of system requirements, practical applications, and deprecated features.

segment.source: Encrypted Hard Drive
segment.target: Encrypted Hard Drive

segment.source: Encrypted Hard Drive uses the rapid encryption that is provided by BitLocker Drive Encryption to enhance data security and management.
segment.target: Encrypted Hard Drive uses the rapid encryption that is provided by BitLocker Drive Encryption to enhance data security and management.

segment.source: Security auditing
segment.target: Security auditing

segment.source: Topics in this section are for IT professionals and describes the security auditing features in Windows and how your organization can benefit from using these technologies to enhance the security and manageability of your network.
segment.target: Topics in this section are for IT professionals and describes the security auditing features in Windows and how your organization can benefit from using these technologies to enhance the security and manageability of your network.

segment.source: Security policy settings
segment.target: Security policy settings

segment.source: This reference topic describes the common scenarios, architecture, and processes for security settings.
segment.target: This reference topic describes the common scenarios, architecture, and processes for security settings.

segment.source: Trusted Platform Module
segment.target: Trusted Platform Module

segment.source: This topic for the IT professional describes the Trusted Platform Module (TPM) and how Windows uses it for access control and authentication.
segment.target: This topic for the IT professional describes the Trusted Platform Module (TPM) and how Windows uses it for access control and authentication.

segment.source: The topic provides links to other resources about the TPM.
segment.target: The topic provides links to other resources about the TPM.

segment.source: User Account Control
segment.target: User Account Control

segment.source: User Account Control (UAC) helps prevent malware from damaging a PC and helps organizations deploy a better-managed desktop.
segment.target: User Account Control (UAC) helps prevent malware from damaging a PC and helps organizations deploy a better-managed desktop.

segment.source: With UAC, apps and tasks always run in the security context of a non-administrator account, unless an administrator specifically authorizes administrator-level access to the system.
segment.target: With UAC, apps and tasks always run in the security context of a non-administrator account, unless an administrator specifically authorizes administrator-level access to the system.

segment.source: UAC can block the automatic installation of unauthorized apps and prevent inadvertent changes to system settings.
segment.target: UAC can block the automatic installation of unauthorized apps and prevent inadvertent changes to system settings.

segment.source: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection
segment.target: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection

segment.source: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP) is an out-of-the-box Windows enterprise security service that enables enterprise cybersecurity teams to detect and respond to advanced threats on their networks.
segment.target: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP) is an out-of-the-box Windows enterprise security service that enables enterprise cybersecurity teams to detect and respond to advanced threats on their networks.

segment.source: Windows Defender in Windows 10
segment.target: Windows Defender in Windows 10

segment.source: This topic provides an overview of Windows Defender, including a list of system requirements and new features.
segment.target: This topic provides an overview of Windows Defender, including a list of system requirements and new features.

segment.source: Windows Firewall with Advanced Security
segment.target: Windows Firewall with Advanced Security

segment.source: Windows Firewall with Advanced Security is an important part of a layered security model.
segment.target: Windows Firewall with Advanced Security is an important part of a layered security model.

segment.source: By providing host-based, two-way network traffic filtering for a device, Windows Firewall with Advanced Security blocks unauthorized network traffic flowing into or out of the local device.
segment.target: By providing host-based, two-way network traffic filtering for a device, Windows Firewall with Advanced Security blocks unauthorized network traffic flowing into or out of the local device.
